summary_one_paragraph: On March 4, 1971, Randy L. Thompson of the 66th MI Group submitted an agent report based on a local agency check conducted by the Provost Marshal's Office (PMO) of the US Army Berlin Brigade on Henry S. Beer's step-son, Joachim S. Beer, also known as Joachim F. Pehl. The check revealed derogatory information concerning Joachim, specifically a report of a fire on December 19, 1970, and a disturbing the peace complaint on January 22, 1971, under his service record with the US Army Berlin Brigade.
title: AGENT REPORT
